source.sqlReaderQuery:
-- SELECT [EA01_ID]
--      , [EA01_DM01ID]
--      , [EA01_EMAILTO]
--      , [EA01_USER]
--      , CAST ([EA01_SDTE ] AS DATE) AS [EA01_SDTE]
--      , [EA01_STATUS]
--      , [EA01_MESSAGE]
--   FROM [dbo].[EA01]

SELECT [EA01_ID]
     , [EA01_DM01ID]
     , [EA01_EMAILTO]
     , [EA01_USER]
     , CAST ([EA01_SDTE ] AS smalldatetime) AS [EA01_SDTE]
     , [EA01_STATUS]
     , [EA01_MESSAGE]
  FROM [dbo].[EA01]
